A Taste of Cero Bodega: 3 Cocktail Recipes

Why should treating yourself stop when the vacation is over? Turn your vacation into a lifestyle by incorporating little ways to kick back at home. We’ve curated a list of Cero Bodega’s most delectable cocktails as a little reminder of your relaxing vacay. It’s our way of giving you a bit of The Marker experience right at home. When you craft your Cero Bodega inspired cocktail, make sure to share it on Instagram and to tag us! Use our #LoveTheMarker and we may feature your mouth-watering beverage on our feed.

 

Ocean Blue

The Taste: A refreshing mix of fresh blueberry and mint paired with a tart bite of lime. With an added splash club soda and vodka, it’s just the perfect amount of bubbles! 

Ingredients: 

-Blueberries

-Fresh Mint

-Sugar

-1 Lime

-Blueberry Vodka

-Club Soda

The Recipe:

Step 1: Muddle 8 blueberries, 6 fresh mint leaves, 2 teaspoons of sugar and 2 tablespoons fresh lime juice in a cocktail shaker.

Step 2: Add 2 oz of Blueberry Vodka (Cero Bodega recommends Skyy Vodka).

Step 3: Stir well and pour into a glass filled with ice, leaving an inch of room to top with club soda. 

Step 4: Garnish with blueberries, mint leaves and a slice of lime!

 

Blood Orange Margarita

The Taste: A citrus-filled cocktail with bright bursts of tangy tequila and fresh lime juice, topped with a salt rim for the perfect flavor contrast.

Ingredients: 

-Blood Orange Ale

-Tequila

-Cointreau

-1 Lime

-Blood Orange Ale

-Salt

-Grenadine

-Orange (for garnish)

The Recipe:

Step 1: Fill cocktail shaker with ice, 1.5 oz Tequila, .5 oz Cointreau, 1 oz fresh lime juice and shake generously.

Step 2: Pour over ice into a glass with a salted rim. Top with Blood Orange Ale and a splash of grenadine.

Step 3: Garnish with a slice of orange – enjoy!

 

Sangria Fresca

The Taste: A juicy mix of fresh grape, peach, strawberry, and raspberries, cut with dry white wine and sweet elderflower. 

Ingredients: 

-Dry White Wine

-Elder Flower Liqueur

-Raspberries

-Strawberries

-Grapes

-Peaches

The Recipe:

Step 1: Fill a pitcher with 1 bottle a crisp, dry white wine and 2 oz elderflower liqueur

Step 2:  Add fresh raspberries, strawberries, grapes & peaches

Step 3: Add ice, stir and share with friends.
